content: daniel s hat we love the on trend shape of a simple knitted hat with a cosy brim and pom-pom on top this one skein project is bound to provide you with plenty of opportunities to gleefully tell admirers i made this stylish knits that are budget friendly we love them the daniel s hat begins with a 2x2 ribbed band perfect to fold over and keep ears cosy the construction of daniel s hat is full of polished details the crown shaping is worked at 3 points with paired decreases making for an interesting detail that also fits well it s a construction note we borrowed from on-trend
